name: InfiniToast (GGJ 2020)
description:
A MetroidVania game about a broken and discarded Toaster seeking to become whole again. Traverse the overworld to find your missing parts and become the toaster you once were.

Made for GGJ 2023.

Credits: 

Programming

  • Ryan Dunagan
  • Marcus McGuire
  • Nick Sundermeyer
  • Andy Schiff
  • Garret Sugarbaker

Art

  • Hannah Renea “HR” Bumgarner

Sound

  • B.M. Quinn
  • Mudiwa Williams
